replies.author: w44225769
replies.txt_content:
@echo OFF
color 2
java -Xmx2048M -Xms2048M -jar mcpc-plus-1.6.2.jar
PAUSE

mcpc-plus-1.6.2.jar改成你的mcpc.jar

这是我的  简单粗暴  你的  说实话     没几句看得懂
